attacks.name: Naptime
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 3 damage counters from Sabrina's Slowbro and Sabrina's Slowbro is now Asleep. If Sabrina's Slowbro has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Screaming Headbutt
attacks.effect: You can't use this attack during your next turn.
